reviewText: This is pretty cool.  A message and a song about America.  This would be a good gift around the fourth of July season, or just because we are in America!  The message is a blessing!

At a time when everything seems to be on a decline--morally, economically, spiritually--find out what you can do for your nation.  This CD includes a message by Pastor Chuck Smith and a special closing song, "Lord, Give Us America" performed by Dennis Agajanian.
